name: PlantBad CO.
description:
Become a worker robot at PlantBadCO-s newest power plant! It's 2050 and the only workers are robots, who dont know how to finish their jobs! Take care of all their duties and finish your shift to get out!

The game contains 3 endings

  1.  Bad Ending
  2.  Good Ending
  3.  Secret True Ending

Credits :

  • Almost all the work : KeWin
  • Robot voice acting : Zeli & Deku
  • Sound effects  : https://freesound.org
  • Newspaper template : www.teacherspayteachers.com

Programmes used :

  • Photoshop 2020
  • Audacity
  • Aseprite
  • Unity
  • Blender
